enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
section_title: OZONE AND CLIMATE ISSUES - HFCS AND PFCS
sentences: The US expressed reservations about inviting submissions from Parties on this matter.

CHINA, with SAUDI ARABIA and JAMAICA, proposed removing a paragraph inviting the Montreal Protocol to make a statement at a future session of SBSTA, while the EU, NORWAY and SENEGAL supported retaining it.
The US said it would accept the paragraph if the call for submissions was removed.
